name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior AWS Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **AWS** and **CI/CD** practices. Proficient in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **GitHub**, **GitLab**, and **Jenkins**, with a strong focus on building and automating deployment workflows to enhance operational efficiency. Skilled in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**, with hands-on development expertise across multiple frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Experienced in cloud-native application deployment on platforms like **AWS**, while ensuring system compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, complemented by practical experience in CI/CD automation. Demonstrated ability to manage and optimize production workflows and MLOps using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive real-world impact.
